revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bitmain |model=AntRouter |revision=R1-LTC |fcc_date=04/16/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, crypto currency miner |fcc_id=2APAA-R1LTC |pwr_v=100-220 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand=Bitmain |cpu2_model=BM1485 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5TU32M16CG-3C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=ITM-AP08 V1.0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=Litecoin miner, |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt;, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.200.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=root }} {{TagLine|Router Miner}} :{{ProductPage|https://shop.bitmain.com/antrouter_r1_ltc_wireless_router_and_asic_litecoin_miner.htm}}
"2015-12-07", "AR9331 AP08 V1.7", "CYS0032", and "2016.01.16" :are silkscreened on the Ethernet board in the FCC photos.
"ANT_Miner_R1_V1.9", "CYS0035", and "20160221" are silkscreened :on the mani board in the FCC photos. "ITM-AP08 V1.0" and "2014-2-26" are silkscreened on the Wi-Fi :module in the FCC photos.
*[http://www.52rd.com/Blog/Detail_RD.Blog_QQ42142951_97686.html ''AR9331 Core Module ITM-AP08-B50CXX0864NV1'' on 52rd.com]
FCC entry appears to cover additional models with different "main chips": * R1-LTC - ''Bitmain'' BM1485 * R1-SIA - ''Bitmain'' BM1720 * R1-DASH - ''Bitmain'' BM1760
__NOTOC__
